name: Molasses!
description:
Molasses!

If you can please use the executable below. The embedded version above has slightly flaky sound and if you are on a high refresh rate monitor (120 or 75hz for example) the sound is entirely broken. This just seems to be the way the TIC-80 HTML export is at the moment, sorry!

North End, Boston, 1919.

2.3 Million gallons of molasses.

One newsboy.

Save people from the sweetest of disasters in this Rampart-inspired strategy game!

Controls
  • Left mouse: Place piece
  • Right mouse: Rotate piece
  • R: Restart level
  • P: Pause
  • F11: Fullscreen
  • F: Disable flashing

My entry into the awful winter jam 2018.

Created for the TIC-80.

Source code.
